issue.title: [CF 124] [Resolved] Bug with detecting paladin Buffs
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.104, Microsoft Windows NT 5.1.2600 Service Pack 3

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 3.0.4a

Description

When I add a buff in the slot (with the ID number and the config) and when i Uses the spell after activating the icon nothing happened ! can you help me ?

Installed Addons

_NPCScan - _NPCScan 4.0.3.6 _NPCScan.Overlay - _NPCScan.Overlay 4.0.3.2 Ace3 - Release-r1009 Atlasloot Enhanced - v6.02.00 Bartender4 - 4.4.17 DBM-SpellTimers (Deadly Boss Mods) - DBM-SpellTimers r70 Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.72-5085 Decursive - 2.6.0.1 Grid - 1.40000.1403 GridStatusRaidDebuff - r290 NugComboBar - NugComboBar 4.1.1 Omen Threat Meter - v3.1.0 OmniCC - 4.0.waffles11 OmniCC_Disable_PitBull4 - v0.2 PitBull Unit Frames 4.0 - v4.0.0-beta25 Quartz - 3.0.5 Recount - v4.0.1e release SexyMap - v1.2.4 ShieldsUp - 4.0.3.105 TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 3.0.4a


> Posted by CurseForge user Mitghard | Imported from CurseForge issue #124 | Raw

comments.body:
I'm guessing you are still in config mode. Type /tmw to toggle config mode on/off.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Here is the Problem, when I use the /tmw command, the window disappears but when i use Judjements of the Pure or Beacon of light (config with The ID number) Nothing happened, i have verified my config with other users of this addon but it seems be correct ....


> Posted by CurseForge user Mitghard

There are 6 different spells named "Judgements of the Pure" and 3 named "Beacon of Light". Verify that you are using the correct ID of the buff itself, or use the spell name.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
